abstract: Edouard Carmignac, the founder of the French money manager Carmignac Gestion, took out full-page ads in four newspapers to offer his final advice to Jean-Claude Trichet, who is retiring as president the European Central Bank.
snippet: Edouard Carmignac, the founder of the French money manager Carmignac Gestion, took out full-page ads in four newspapers to offer his final advice to Jean-Claude Trichet, who is retiring as president the European Central Bank.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- At least one financier will not be sad to see the European Central Bank president, Jean-Claude Trichet, retire this month.
